programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: The Librarians travel to a town where fairy tales are coming to life - and attacking.

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: When a group of competitive high-school students start undercutting each other with witchcraft, the Librarians have to intercede before disaster destroys them all.

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: The Librarians encounter the House behind the legend of ALL haunted houses and set out to destroy it.

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: An investigation into a missing person uncovers what appears to be an alien invasion.

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: When the Serpent Brotherhood wants to kill Santa, the Librarians must rescue him and help him accomplish the true, secret purpose of Christmas.

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: When the dragons sleeping beneath the earth threaten to awaken and wreak havoc around the world, Flynn returns to help find their hidden treasure.
